# Root biomass
rb = fine root + coarse root biomass
```{r}

Root.biomass[, "Root.biomass" := rowSums(.SD,na.rm=T), .SDcols=c("Fine_Roots_Biomass", "Coarse_Roots_Biomass")]
Root.biomass <- data.table::setnames(Root.biomass[,c("EP_Plotid", "Root.biomass")], old=c("EP_Plotid", "Root.biomass"), new=c("Plot", "Root.biomass"))
```
